items.sentence: A lot of English words are derived from Latin.
Did Tom tell Mary when John would be arriving?
Tom and Mary said that they would write to us.
Tom and Mary used to be married to each other.
Tom and Mary waited for the elevator together.
What\'s the spiciest thing you\'ve ever eaten?
Who\'s going to tell Tom he can\'t go with us?
Tom should\'ve stayed for a couple more hours.
I help Tom with his homework almost every day.
I hope you and Tom have a good time in Boston.
